DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether basic periodontal therapy aim reduce subgingival level Porphyromonas gingivalis Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans , impact vascular function patient suffer establish cardiovascular disease .
DOC.detailed_description: Design : randomized clinical trial , parallel design , double blind . Sample : 120 patient Cardiology Department Hospital Severo Ochoa ( Leganés , Madrid ) suffer establish cardiovascular disease generalize moderate/severe periodontitis . Sixty patient randomized test group ( scale root plan + systemic antimicrobial ) , 60 subject include control group , consist delay periodontal treatment ( supragingival prophylaxis + placebo ) . Study visit : Visit 1 : screening Visit 2 : baseline data collection ( medical history , clinical variable , gingival crevicular fluid ( GCF ) sample , vascular function ) Visit 3 : panoramic x-ray , blood sample , randomization first treatment session . Visit 4 : second treatment session . Visit 5 : 24 hour inflammatory biomarkers assessment . Visit 6 : 7 day inflammatory biomarkers assessment . Visit 7 : 1 month follow ( clinical variable ) Visit 8 : 3 month follow ( clinical variable , vascular function ) supportive periodontal therapy . Visit 9 : 6 month follow ( clinical variable , GCF sample , inflammatory biomarkers , vascular function ) supportive periodontal therapy .
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) patient establish cardiovascular disease ( unstable angina stroke previous 3 12 month , leave ventricular ejection fraction ≥50 % ) ; ( 2 ) diagnosis moderate severe generalize periodontitis ( PD > 5mm marginal bone loss > 30 % least 50 % teeth , accord Tonetti et al . 2007 ) ; ( 3 ) presence least 3 teeth per quadrant . ( 1 ) periodontal treatment previous year ; ( 2 ) antibiotic intake previous 3 month ; ( 3 ) smoker ≥10 cigarette per day ; ( 4 ) pregnancy breast feeding ; ( 5 ) diabetes mellitus type I II , glycosylated hemoglobin value > 7 ; ( 6 ) necrotizing periodontal disease ; ( 7 ) HIV infection ; ( 8 ) chronic intake NSAID
